We're looking at moving to using `@material-ui/system` instead of `styled-system` (at least when it's out of alpha). One of the API features that we use from [`styled-system`](https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/blob/master/packages/material-ui-system/src/sizing.js) that's missing is support for following syntax:

Adding support for this would probably require a change to https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/blob/master/packages/material-ui-system/src/sizing.js. Is this something you'd be interested in looking at / open to a pull request on?
In many circumstances constructing percentage strings is more cumbersome than using `number` fractions (thinking particularly when constructing a grid).
